mapper.sql: ID, MAT_SERVE_ID, NAME, LEVEL_CERT, LICENCE_AUTHORITH, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, MOT, ATTACH
mapper.insert:
insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE
ID,
MAT_SERVE_ID,
NAME,
LEVEL_CERT,
LICENCE_AUTHORITH,
EXP_START_DATE,
EXP_END_DATE,
MOT,
ATTACH,
#{id},
#{matServeId},
#{name},
#{levelCert},
#{licenceAuthorith},
#{expStartDate},
#{expEndDate},
#{mot},
#{attach},
select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE
MAT_SERVE_ID = #{matServeId},
NAME = #{name},
LEVEL_CERT = #{levelCert},
LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith},
EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate},
EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate},
MOT = #{mot},
ATTACH = #{attach},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE set MAT_SERVE_ID = #{matServeId}, NAME = #{name}, LEVEL_CERT = #{levelCert}, LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith}, EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate}, EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate}, MOT = #{mot}, ATTACH = #{attach} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_SERVE c JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_SERVE m ON m.ID = c.MAT_SERVE_ID WHERE m.SUPPLIER_ID =#{supplierId}
